name: Central Puerto
brief_description: Central Puerto is a leader in electricity generation in Argentina. It has been investing continuously for over 20 years and operates an installed capacity of 6,703 MW. The company is also involved in the production and sale of high-quality wood and its derivatives, in line with global standards for sustainable forest plantations.

name: Pampa Energia
brief_description: Pampa Energía S.A. is the largest integrated electricity company in Argentina. Through its subsidiaries, it participates in the generation, transmission, and distribution of electricity.
services: ['Generación de Energía Eléctrica', 'Refinación e Industria Petroquímica', 'Exploración y Producción de Gas & Petróleo', 'Trasmisión y Distribución de Energía Electrica', 'Transporte de Gas & Petróleo']
